translation.creole: wen di leedii don mek di lakto, shi tek a faiv

translation.en: We have completed the ploughing. There is no more ploughing left to be done.
translation.creole: Wii plou di fiil don. Nomoo plou lef fu du.

translation.en: We finish ploughing the field and after that, we remain with that for a few years
translation.creole: wi das plou di fiil don an afta dat fu kopl yeerz wi das wok wid dat

translation.en: Old man, please, don’t come and frighten us
translation.creole: ool maan, duu, yu mosn kom fraikin awii

translation.en: Old lady, please, you should go an scare my relatives
translation.creole: Mi taak se, ool leedi, du, yu mosn gu an fraikn  mi faambli dem

translation.en: Well, it is not until Monday morning that they will loosen that and carry it and bury it in the canal
translation.creole: Wel, da til mondi maanin dem gu luus da, an dem gu kyarii am gu an beriyon am in di chrench

translation.en: When we see you, we will be frightened
translation.creole: Wen awii gu si yu, awii gu fraikin

translation.en: Lord, when will this cutlass come out of my hand
translation.creole: Laad, a wen dis kotlis a guk om out a mi aan

translation.en: I will go to the chapel
translation.creole: mi sa go sapl

translation.en: Well, if Mary Jane can become a member there, then we can become members too
translation.creole: Wel, if Meerii Jeens a memba dee, den awii sa memba tu

translation.en: He knew the answer, and I think he still knows it
translation.creole: ii bin noo di ansa an mi tingk ii stil noo am

translation.en: Once upon a time, he knew to do it but I don’t think he knows to do it now
translation.creole: laang taim, ii bin noo fu du am bot mi no tingk se ii noo nou

translation.en: One was a goldsmith and the other was a cow-minder
translation.creole: Wan bin a goolsmit an wan bin a koumaina

translation.en: A man hanged himself on that tree
translation.creole: Wan maan bin a heng iiself pan da chrii

translation.en: I was big. I must have been fourteen, fifteen years old at the time
translation.creole: Mi bin big. Mi mosi bout footiin, fiftiin yeer a di taim

translation.en: I had gone there in the time before my father died
translation.creole: mi gu de bifoor mi faada de:d

translation.en: If I hadn’t come here, I wouldn’t have known. Women are dying here for the lack of men
translation.creole: If mi na bin kom ya, mi na bin noo, uman a ded ya fu maan

translation.en: Those other dogs would have eaten it
translation.creole: Dem tara daag bin go nyam am

translation.en: They would have cocked their one ear
translation.creole: Dem bin sa kak dem wan yeez

translation.en: I have been here since morning.
translation.creole: Mi bin hee sins maaanin

translation.en: I had gone to the rice field to work. I did not hear when the morning train passesed
translation.creole: Mi bin a rais fiiil go wok, mi na heer wen maanin chreen paas

translation.en: When you were in Kurupung, you weren’t in the habit of telling me, ‘Good morning’
translation.creole: Wen yu bin a Kurupung, yu na bin tel mi maanin

translation.en: Well, only dead people can be on a dam appearing to carry a coffin. Living people can’t do that
translation.creole: Wel, a oonlii dehd piipl kyan de a daam se dem a kyai kaafn. Livin piipl kyaahn du da

translation.en: You shouldn’t be walking about so late or else ghosts will carry you away
translation.creole: yu mosn waak so leet els jombii gu kyai yu wee

translation.en: When I got there, I didn’t any longer see any coconuts
translation.creole: Wen mi gu, mi na sii non kooknat ageen

translation.en: You can come because this is your house
translation.creole: yu ken kom kaaz dis a yu hous

translation.en: All the veins are tied together and get fat
translation.creole: An di veen kom tugeda, an kom fat so

translation.en: They took a chipper and chipped it until it became soft
translation.creole: Dem tek chipa an dem chipa ram an bring am saaf

translation.en: The food has spoiled
translation.creole: Di fuud gu baad

translation.en: It must be something to make you tell me not to go there
translation.creole: ii dom mos gatu bii somting mek yu tel mi na gu de

translation.en: I will not be able to attend
translation.creole: Mi gu kyaahn mek am

translation.en: You are usually able to plant
translation.creole: Yu doz kyan plaant

translation.en: They would have robbed me
translation.creole: dem bin a gu raab mi

translation.en: They were probably telling lies on me
translation.creole: dem mosii bin a tel lai pan mi

translation.en: There is nothing there
translation.creole: Notn na de de

translation.en: I had not finished talking to them
translation.creole: Mi no bin don gyaaf wid dem

translation.en: The mangoes are ripening on the tree right now
translation.creole: Di manggo dem a raip pon di chrii rait nou

translation.en: Our mangoes have ripened some time ago
translation.creole: Awii manggo don raip laang taim

translation.en: I left my house and was walking down the road when dogs came barking behind me.
translation.creole: Mi lef mi hous a waak dong di rood an daag kom baak behain mi

translation.en: You folk left your house and were walking down the road when a dog came barking after you.
translation.creole: Ayu dis lef ayu hous a waak dong di rood an daag kom baak behain ayu

translation.en: Don’t bother to go there if you haven’t been there already
translation.creole: Na bada gu de if yu no bín de aredii

translation.en: Those who haven’t gone should go now
translation.creole: Huu na gaan, ayu beta gu nou

translation.en: You didn’t have to carry a birth certificate in order to work
translation.creole: Yu na bin gat fu kyarii bort sortifikeet fu wok

translation.en: Make him leave
translation.creole: Mek i gwe

translation.en: We are going to stop him from walking late at night
translation.creole: Awii gu stap ii fram waak leet

translation.en: I don’t know why they are doing this
translation.creole: mi no noo wai dem a du dis ting

translation.en: She wants you to do it right away
translation.creole: Shi waan yu mos du am seem taim

translation.en: It is this that I kow
translation.creole: A dis mi noo

translation.en: It is Sita who had seen a woman’
translation.creole: A Sita bin si wan uman

translation.en: Sita saw a goat
translation.creole: Sita si wan goot

translation.en: It is only women that Kissha had heard about
translation.creole: A beer uman Kiisha bin heer bout

translation.en: My brother would have worked in a hospital but he got a better job
translation.creole: Mi bodii bin go wok a haaspital bot dem ii ge wan beta wok

translation.en: It is work that my brother was going to do at the hospital
translation.creole: A wok mi bodii bin gu wok a hospital

translation.en: It was a female doctor who saw my sister
translation.creole: A wan uman dakta bin si mi sista

translation.en: My mother bought a book
translation.creole: Mi muma bai buk

translation.en: My father bought books
translation.creole: Mi daadii bai buk

translation.en: Books are really expensive indeed
translation.creole: Buk prapa deer fu chruu

translation.en: I sold the girl a mango
translation.creole: Mi sel di gyal wan manggo

translation.en: He went to shower but hasn’t done so yet
translation.creole: ii gaan fu beed bot ii na beed yet

translation.en: he went to take a show and when he came out, he dried himself off very quickly
translation.creole: seem taim, ii gaan gu beed an wen ii kom out, ii jrai aaf ii skin kwik kwik

translation.en: He took the knife to cut the bread but he changed his mind and didn’t cut it
translation.creole: Hii tek di naif fo kot di brehd bot ii cheenj ii main an na kot am

translation.en: One of them whas the man who had the bomb
translation.creole: Wan a dem a di maan bin get di bam

translation.en: She had a grand-daughter who was being looked after by her’
translation.creole: she get wan graan piknin bina main

translation.en: There is a woman who has daughters
translation.creole: dem get wan uman we get gyal-pikini

translation.en: Even though soap isn’t there, I will wash it
translation.creole: Doohn kee soop na de, mi sa wash am

translation.en: She bought the eggs.
translation.creole: ii bai di ehg-dem.

translation.en: Did he buy the eggs?
translation.creole: ii bai di ehg-dem?

translation.en: They are making us suffer
translation.creole: dem a ponish abi

translation.en: We are really suffering
translation.creole: Abi a prapa ponish

translation.en: The teacher came to see you
translation.creole: Di tiicha kom fu sii yu

translation.en: The teacher has already come and gone since one o’clock
translation.creole: Di tiicha don kom an gaan sins wan aklak

translation.en: When I entered the room, he had finished eating his banana
translation.creole: Wen mi bin kom iin di ruum, ii bin finish nyam ii banaana

translation.en: I will tell her if I see her
translation.creole: mi gu tel am if mi si am

translation.en: If I had seen him, I would have told him
translation.creole: If mi bin sii am, mi bin go tel am

translation.en: If you buy meet, he would eat it all off
translation.creole: If yuu bai miit, ii go nyam am aaf

translation.en: He didn’t know what he would do
translation.creole: ii na bin noo wa ii go du

translation.en: I should have hit her
translation.creole: mi bin fu nak am

translation.en: He was about to hit you but his mother stopped him
translation.creole: ii bin fu nak yu bot ii muma stap ii

translation.en: I heard drums beating
translation.creole: mi heer jrom a nak

translation.en: You folk must have heard that a celebration is being held
translation.creole: Ayu mos heer se kaandel a kiip

translation.en: They saw him come
translation.creole: dem sii I kom

translation.en: I heard the boy singing
translation.creole: mi heer di bai a sing

translation.en: Make him leave
translation.creole: Mek ii gowe

translation.en: Don’t prevent him from working
translation.creole: na mek ii na wok

translation.en: It is I who prevented him from working
translation.creole: A mii mek ii na wok

translation.en: She said she didn’t see him
translation.creole: ii taak se ii na si am

translation.en: She told me that she didn’t see it
translation.creole: ii tel mi se ii na si am

translation.en: I know that he didn’t see her
translation.creole: Mi noo se mi na si am

translation.en: Isn’t it true that the lady has left?
translation.creole: Na chruu se di leedii gaan?

translation.en: I know that they have gone
translation.creole: mi noo se dem gaan

translation.en: I know already that they have gone home
translation.creole: mi noo aredii se dem kech hous
